item.title: 扇贝批量加词（Shell script）
item.description: 先每行一个写入words.txt，然后网页端加一个，开发者工具 – 网络 – Copy as curl，得到如下形式： curl 'https://www.shanbay.com/bdc/vocabulary/add/batch/?words=clerical&_=1494415650964' -H 'Host: www.shanbay.com' -H 'User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64; rv:53.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/53.0' -H 'Accept: application/json, text/javascript, */*; q=0.01' -H
